TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Duration extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Immutable representation of a time span as defined in the W3C XML Schema 1.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration Add(class Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration rhs) cil managed

Docs.summary: Computes a new duration whose value is this+rhs.

Docs.exception: If the rhs parameter is null.
If two durations cannot be meaningfully added. For example, adding negative one day to one month causes this exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Compare(class Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration duration) cil managed

Docs.summary: Partial order relation comparison with this Duration instance.
Docs.returns: the relationship between this Durationand duration parameter as DatatypeConstants#LESSER, DatatypeConstants#EQUAL, DatatypeConstants#GREATER or DatatypeConstants#INDETERMINATE.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If the underlying implementation cannot reasonably process the request, e.g. W3C XML Schema allows for arbitrarily large/small/precise values, the request may be beyond the implementations capability.
if duration is null.

Docs.summary: Obtains the value of the DAYS field as an integer value, or 0 if not present.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Lang.Number GetField(class Javax.Xml.Datatype.DatatypeConstants/Field field) cil managed

Docs.param: one of the six Field constants (YEARS,MONTHS,DAYS,HOURS, MINUTES, or SECONDS.)
Docs.summary: Gets the value of a field.
Docs.returns: If the specified field is present, this method returns a non-null non-negative Number object that represents its value. If it is not present, return null. For YEARS, MONTHS, DAYS, HOURS, and MINUTES, this method returns a java.math.BigInteger object. For SECONDS, this method returns a java.math.BigDecimal.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If the field is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 GetTimeInMillis(class Java.Util.Calendar startInstant) cil managed
abstract member GetTimeInMillis : Java.Util.Calendar -> int64 override this.GetTimeInMillis : Java.Util.Calendar -> int64

Docs.param: The length of a month/year varies. The startInstant is used to disambiguate this variance. Specifically, this method returns the difference between startInstant and startInstant+duration
Docs.summary: Returns the length of the duration in milliseconds.

abstract member IsLongerThan : Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration -> bool override this.IsLongerThan : Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration -> bool

Docs.summary: Checks if this duration object is strictly longer than another Duration object.
Docs.returns: true if the duration represented by this object is longer than the given duration. false otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If the underlying implementation cannot reasonably process the request, e.g. W3C XML Schema allows for arbitrarily large/small/precise values, the request may be beyond the implementations capability.
If duration is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration Multiply(class Java.Math.BigDecimal factor) cil managed

Docs.param: Factor times longer of new Duration to create.
Docs.summary: Computes a new duration whose value is factor times longer than the value of this duration.
Docs.returns: New Duration that is factortimes longer than this Duration.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if operation produces fraction in the months field.
if the factor parameter is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration NormalizeWith(class Java.Util.Calendar startTimeInstant) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts the years and months fields into the days field by using a specific time instant as the reference point.
Docs.returns: Duration of years and months of this Duration as days.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If the startTimeInstant parameter is null.

Docs.summary: Obtains the value of the SECONDS field as an integer value, or 0 if not present.
Docs.value: seconds in the integer value. The fraction of seconds will be discarded (for example, if the actual value is 2.5, this method returns 2)

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the sign of this duration in -1,0, or 1.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration Subtract(class Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration rhs) cil managed
abstract member Subtract : Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration -> Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration override this.Subtract : Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration -> Javax.Xml.Datatype.Duration

Docs.summary: Computes a new duration whose value is this-rhs.
Docs.returns: New Duration created from subtracting rhs from this Duration.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If two durations cannot be meaningfully subtracted. For example, subtracting one day from one month causes this exception.
If the rhs parameter is null.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return the name of the XML Schema date/time type that this instance maps to.
Docs.value: one of the following constants: DatatypeConstants#DURATION, DatatypeConstants#DURATION_DAYTIME or DatatypeConstants#DURATION_YEARMONTH.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If the combination of set fields does not match one of the XML Schema date/time datatypes.

Docs.summary: Get the years value of this Duration as an int or 0 if not present.
Docs.value: If the years field is present, return its value as an int, else return 0.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
